header.title: Politihkalaš ráđđeaddi Jon Reidar Øyan - regjeringen.no

body.p: Political Adviser Jon Reidar Øyan - regjeringen.no
Orkdal Upper Secondary School, specialising in sports. Qualification for admission to higher education
Information officer for the Norwegian Labour Party’s parliamentary group
Elected leader of the Norwegian LGBT Association (LLH)
Elected leader of the Norwegian LGBT Association (LLH), Oslo and Akershus
Before and after-school programme assistant and supply teacher, Bestum school
Office worker, the interpreting service for deaf and deaf-blind people, the Assistive Technology Centre in Oslo
Various summer and part-time jobs Fastweb ASA: Telemarketer Marine Harvest, Terningen branch: Fish farm worker TNS Gallup: Telephone interviewer Terningen dairy cooperative: Stand-in, milk production
Member of the national committee of the Norwegian School Students Union Chief responsibility for financing of studies and vocational training
Board member of the Norwegian State Educational Loan Fund, Oslo
Elected member of the municipal council in Snillfjord municipality, for the Labour Party, first deputy to the executive committee
Leader of the student council, Orkdal Upper Secondary School
